channel.title: Joomla! Documentation - Vulnerable Extensions List
channel.description:
Please check with the extension publisher in case of any questions over the security of their product. Report Vulnerable extensions either in the jforum:432 security topic clearly marked with the first word in the title being Vulnerable Report where the security moderators or JSST team will respond. For a guide to the codes Previous Reports
Extension Details Date Added Extension Update Link & Date
